# lmp_data

# Description

`lmp_data` is a modules created for data analysis of data from Lammps, based on `Julia`. 

# Installation

You can install this package direcly in `Julia` with commends below:

```julia-repl
pkg> add https://github.com/zhenyuwei99/lmp_data.git
```
